website_summaries.verdict: Feel like you’re wearing nothing on the mat because of how light the Adidas Pretereo III is. Its split-sole unit won’t hinder forefoot bending needed when pushing against your opponent. The mesh top ensures a comfortable in-shoe experience because it is soft and breathable, features that wrestlers find to be quite appealing.
pros: Almost all of the owners rave about the perfect fit of the Adidas Pretereo III
This pair of wrestling shoes is very comfortable to wear on the mat, according to a majority of users
Many people claim that this model is worth the price because of its quality build
The outsole is grippy and prevented accidental slips and falls, said droves of athletes
The versatility of this trainer has impressed a myriad of sports aficionados who have used it for wrestling, boxing, MMA, cross-training, and weight training
Numerous reviewers state that the lightweight and flexible nature of the shoe promoted quick movements
A good number of wrestlers commend the ankle support on this Adidas wrestling shoe
Plenty of wearers are satisfied with the breathability of the upper
The style and available colorways have pleased multiple folks
cons: The durability of the Pretereo III has dismayed a few testers because the eyelets ripped, the outsole chipped, and the suede quickly lost its fibers after a few weeks of use
A shopper has complained that this Adidas wrestling shoe caused arch pain

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Wide Feet!
customer_reviews.text: Per my son, "They fit great and looks surprisingly awesome!". He has wide feet and always have had difficulty finding wide shoes in cleats etc that didn't have the basic and boring black design. After hours of online research, trying on available shoes at Dicks and Academy (which were boring plain black that were still too narrow despite going up 2 shoe sizes), and reading tons of reviews I came across the Adidas Pretereo III. One reviewer's son wore the same sz shoe as my son and wide feet. They ordered an 11, so we did too. Perfect Fit!! Grey and white shoes with a logo in gold. Hoping they hold up thru the season.
customer_reviews.author: gina p. hidalgo

customer_reviews.title: amazong sneakers for boxing
customer_reviews.text: i use this to do my boxing and mma training and they're made really well. I switched from Nikes and was very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Fame

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: I think all wrestling shoes are a bit narrow but these seem true to size and a little more comfortable. I had to go up a size in the Asics. These are exactly what I've been looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Willijo

customer_reviews.title: Eh
customer_reviews.text: Nice shoe but it distroyed my archs sometimes I can barely walk I now have to use a permanent high arch in my shoes. No more flips flops no more barefoot walking its painfull
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: High quality, perfect fit - great for martial arts on mats
customer_reviews.text: These are high quality, fit very nicely, and are perfect for what I’m looking for. I’m wearing them on mats for martial arts. They slide on the mats just enough without gripping. Previously, I tried the much cheaper ASICS which are sized for aliens with very narrow feet. While these Adidas cost more, they are worth it - a huge upgrade.
customer_reviews.author: H. Kee

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: Perfect shoes. Ordered them for my my husband who is a pro boxer, and is super picky about shoes he wears.. these fit perfect!
customer_reviews.author: DinaS

customer_reviews.title: Son loves them
customer_reviews.text: Got them for my son.. His foot is a little on the wide side but extra wide shoes are hard to find. His teammate said they fit his wide foot pretty well and so they do. He broke them in yesterday by winning the big tournament here.
customer_reviews.author: Jim L

customer_reviews.title: Great pair of shoes
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my daughter who started wrestling and she loves them! Extremely comfortable and the color matches her singlet perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Reiko M. Coria

customer_reviews.title: These look awesome
customer_reviews.text: I bought them as a gift for my husband who also does boxing but thet were too small so I ended up returning. However, the quality was great and the shoes looked pretty sleek
customer_reviews.author: Midori

customer_reviews.title: Great for wide feet and comfort!
customer_reviews.text: My 14 year old just started wrestling and we tried several pairs of ASICS, but all were too narrow or tight across the top of the foot. He says these fit great and are very comfortable! For reference: He’s between 10.5-11 in athletic shoes and the 11 fit perfect.
customer_reviews.author: BeMindful

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes for wrestling!
customer_reviews.text: Lasted the whole season, still in good shape. Good support, comfort and grip. Definitely will buy again, if that's what he wants next season!
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: THE SHOE SIZE IS ACCURATE
customer_reviews.text: I bought a size bigger based on people's review, but I am sure that I could've got my "normal" shoe size an been fine. The shoe itself is still pretty comfortable and super lightweight. Even though its a whole size too big, they still feel good.
customer_reviews.author: Sommer  Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Quality!
customer_reviews.text: Son wore this same pair for first 2 years of JHS wrestling. He likes them so much he had dad order the same shoe and color even after trying to get him to choose different brand and color. Nope! My son said “Want the same shoe again.” No complaints from dad.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Total disappointment!!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered NEW shoes for my grandson and paid $92.00+ for NEW, BUT, the ones that arrived were in a box labeled with a different size AND the wrestling shoes were NOTICEABLY WORN by someone at one point! Total disappointment !!!!
customer_reviews.author: Len

customer_reviews.title: Very nice and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: They came as expected. I really like them. Fit good and didnt take no time to break them in.
customer_reviews.author: Jesus

customer_reviews.title: youth wrestling
customer_reviews.text: my son loved these and worked great he was excited to wear these this last season cant wait for next season
customer_reviews.author: Danyal

customer_reviews.title: The best boxing shoes
customer_reviews.text: I’m a boxing shoe collector and this shoe by far is my favorite. I have the black, and the white and grey. Very comfortable shoes. I love em. My dog ate my first pair and I had no problem buying them again.
customer_reviews.author: Sebastian

customer_reviews.title: I'm not disappointed
customer_reviews.text: They fit and feel comfortable yes I recommend this seller and item to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. K

customer_reviews.title: Light weight, Snug fit.
customer_reviews.text: Alwasy did BJJ so this is my 1st pair of shoes for boxing. They feel great on the canvas, but they're a little tight in the toe. Snug width fit but I like that (No excessive wiggling) . Comfortable ankle support. Super light and look great.
customer_reviews.author: Cody

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: They came on time, fit and are brand new. My son likes them.
customer_reviews.author: B. Ob.

customer_reviews.title: These shoes were grea
customer_reviews.text: I really love this and it just looks the same as the picture and I recommend these shoes for athletes
customer_reviews.author: Farhad aimaq

customer_reviews.title: True Wrestling shoe
customer_reviews.text: My son uses it for wrestling . He has wide feet and it fits him well .
customer_reviews.author: Dinar

customer_reviews.title: My son loves them!!
customer_reviews.text: These shoes look great and my son says they fit perfect, so I have no choice but to love it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Crukit

customer_reviews.title: Great for powerlifting
customer_reviews.text: Great fit and they look good. I use these for weightlifting and I love them.
customer_reviews.author: Albert Basulto

customer_reviews.title: Great for boxing
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had these for a year and they still last. They look cool and fit like regular adidas. I use these to box and I’m happy with the performance.
customer_reviews.author: Moses

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Great product just as it shows in the picture son loves them

customer_reviews.title: Took a couple days to break in but are a great fit.
customer_reviews.text: My grandson loves them. Took a couple days to break in but are a great fit.
customer_reviews.author: Janet Ferguson

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: Shoes fit as expected. Son enjoys them so far. Arrived quickly. Using for wrestling practice and no complaints yet.
customer_reviews.author: Levi

customer_reviews.title: True to size.
customer_reviews.text: My son likes these shoes. They are unlike what the other kids had on today, so it makes him easier to spot in pictures and across the mat.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great grappling shoes!
customer_reviews.text: Sweet shoes and well worth the price. They look great and fit really well.
customer_reviews.author: E. Rodelius

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoe!
customer_reviews.text: They feel great and are durable. I'm a heavyweight that can move and usually, my shoes don't last very long at all but these have been passing the test. Love em!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They feel very comfortable and will definitely last you a long time
customer_reviews.text: I usually go through a pair of wrestling shoes in about eight months but these have lasted me about a year now. They feel very comfortable and will definitely last you a long time. They are on the expensive side but well worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Roman

customer_reviews.title: Wide
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for wide feet. Improved movement on mats and ring for MMA/Boxing.
customer_reviews.author: Edwin Perez

customer_reviews.title: I highly recommend them👌🏾
customer_reviews.text: These are amsome! I use them to work out. And they turn heads. All my gym bros, are getting some. I highly recommend them👌🏾
customer_reviews.author: Rome Colburn

customer_reviews.title: Shoes fit fine, however they were so slick my son could ...
customer_reviews.text: Shoes fit fine,however they were so slick my son could not wrestle in them at all
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Lybrand

customer_reviews.title: A little unreliable
customer_reviews.text: They work well, but a lot of tge strings have come loose and the rubber is falling off the backs of the shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Ethan Morris

customer_reviews.title: Fresh and good fit
customer_reviews.text: My son needed new wrestling shoes and he picked these out and is excited to work out in them!
customer_reviews.author: 😁😁😁😁😁😁😁😁😁😁

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again...
customer_reviews.text: Looks just like pictures. Work well on the mat. Very comfortable and durable.

customer_reviews.title: Look great, feel well also crafted well.
customer_reviews.text: Fit my brother great for large wide feet boxing/wrestling perfect.

customer_reviews.title: QUALity boxing shoe
customer_reviews.text: Good for Boxing alittle heavier then hyper Ko but good support for movement

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe
customer_reviews.text: Shoes fit true to size and seem very durable. I bought these for my 8 year old son and they are holding up well.

customer_reviews.title: Looked great and comfortable right out of the box
customer_reviews.text: Got them for my son to wrestle @CIF finals. Looked great and comfortable right out of the box.

customer_reviews.title: Don't stop making them!!!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect, lightweight, endurable. MI'm satisfied with them. Don't stop making them! !!.

customer_reviews.title: Great pair of shoes
customer_reviews.text: the kid loved them and they fit perfect. He won the first few matches once he put them on.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: My 16 year old son says it seems to be working, getting another order
customer_reviews.author: Chris

product_meta.title: adidas Men's Pretereo III Wrestling Shoes
product_meta.description: The proven London Olympics outsole relaunched with a unique fresh upper. The perfect combination of durability and innovation. The new Pretereo III is an all-around contender. The sticky rubber outsole gives you universal grip in all directions.
feature_bullets: Sticky rubber outsloe for universal grip
Single layer mesh for maximum breatability
Suede midsole edge for consistent contact
